paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant found in the study.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Collapsed at his desk in school, treated for ADHD
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A pathogenic sequence variant in the KCNH2 gene (Ser668Leu) was identified in a 14-year-old boy who died sitting at his desk in school.

functional_data.summary: The variant is predicted to be pathogenic.

variants.evidence_level: predicted pathogenic based on bioinformatic tools
variants.additional_notes: No genetic investigation of parents or siblings was possible due to adoption.
key_quotes: A pathogenic sequence variant in the KCNH2 gene (Ser668Leu) was identified in a 14-year-old boy who died sitting at his desk in school.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the KCNH2 gene was reported in the paper.
